item.title: Spain’s Atresmedia Nabs Rights to Onza Entertainment’s Docuseries ‘Vulnerables,’ on Young People’s Mental Health Issues (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Spain’s leading broadcaster Atresmedia has acquired broadcasting rights to “Vulnerables,” a docuseries on young people’s mental health issues produced by Onza Entertainment. Created by Onz
